title: Perma Banned?????
body:
Game 1
Jahael: pushin top
Jahael: rivs not top
Jahael: okay
Jahael: brain dead ali
Jahael: muted
Jahael: because youre an absolute moron
Jahael: ????????????????????????????
Jahael: muted aswell
Jahael: kys %%%%%%
Jahael: literal trash

I understand that recently Riots been cracking down on toxic behavior. But Its ridiculous that when some sensitive A-hole starts talking shit and I start saying shit back that I get perma banned. After THOUSANDS of hours, and HUNDREDS of dollars, Thats all gone now. Zero incentive to regain 740k mastery points on my main champ and try to start climbing again. 

Knew I should have insta muted chat when the kid started talking shit.
Is there no way to ban appeal this????

replies.body:
> I understand that recently Riots been cracking down on toxic behavior.

If by recent you mean 2.5 years, then yes.

> But Its ridiculous that when some sensitive A-hole starts talking shit and I start saying shit back that I get perma banned.

It's ridiculous that you feel the need to tell someone to end their life just because someone is talking shit to you. It's even more ridiculous that you expect that it's all fine and dandy to tell people to kill themselves. On the 14 day ban reform card you were told it was your last chance.

> After THOUSANDS of hours, and HUNDREDS of dollars, Thats all gone now.

If you plan on investing alot of money and time into something, you also have to make sure you wont get banned from doing said thing. The rules are EXTREMELY easy to follow, you can't 'accidentally' flame and get banned for it. It's a choice you have to make.

> Zero incentive to regain 740k mastery points on my main champ and try to start climbing again.

That's point. Riot doesn't want you to play anymore, but they can't stop you. If you continue flaming again on a new account it'll just get banned aswell.

> Is there no way to ban appeal this????

Nope.
I forget that these days that you cant have any banter anymore, you used to be able to tell a dude to off himself and go on with your lives. Cant say anything anymore, so much sensitivity.

> [{quoted}](name=Jahael,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ep7AHuzb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-18T05:38:37.653+0000)
>
> I forget that these days that you cant have any banter anymore

Sure you can have banter, but what you did was absolutely not banter.

Definition of banter:

> 1. _noun_ the playful and friendly exchange of teasing remarks.

> 2. _verb_ talk or exchange remarks in a good-humored teasing way.

There's no fucking way you told this person to kill themselves in a playful and good-humored way. No, what you did was straight up harassment and being an asshole, and that is not allowed.

> you used to be able to tell a dude to off himself and go on with your lives

As a side note, when was this ever allowed? Granted, I myself am pretty young and haven't been apart of online gaming for as long as many others, but I'm fairly certain that telling someone to commit suicide has **_never_** been acceptable, whether it's online gaming or in the real world.

> you used to be able to tell a dude to off himself and go on with your lives.

That's what made League so toxic back in the days. Now the punishment system has improved by leaps & bounds.

> [{quoted}](name=Jahael,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Ep7AHuzb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-18T05:38:37.653+0000)
>
> I forget that these days that you cant have any banter anymore, you used to be able to tell a dude to off himself and go on with your lives. Cant say anything anymore, so much sensitivity.

Lol, there Is literally nothing I can say here, if you really think that telling someone to kill themselves should be OK. It's not even about this game or games in general, it's just something you don't do.

>Jahael: kys %%%%%%

""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""banter""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""

>you used to be able to tell a dude to off himself and go on with your lives.

In communities that don't care what you say. Not in the real world.

After THOUSANDS of hours, and HUNDREDS of dollars, Thats all gone now. Zero incentive to regain 740k mastery points on my main champ and try to start climbing again.

> Knew I should have insta muted chat when the kid started talking shit.

This shit just happened to me but i did not say the same type of content, i told my nasus toplane to take a break and go take a shower and the Rioter assisting me deemed me worthy to be perma banned as well

>Jahael: kys %%%%%%
Jahael: literal trash

------------------

>But Its ridiculous

What's so ridiculous? You triggered something that would net you insta-14-day ban after you had a previous punishment.

>the kid started talking shit.

Which one? The person you were talking to or are you speaking in third person?

>Is there no way to ban appeal this????

Only if issued in error. I refer you to the first quote.
There's that magical 'kys' again. Another ban in the books.

In addition to not telling people to kill themselves as everyone else mentioned, the %%%%%% in your log is considered by Riot to be hate speech. That earns escalated punishments as well. So, if you come back on another account, you should avoid that also.
Find me that one rule which says that spending money will make you immune to bans.
You can create a support ticket to appeal the ban, but seeing as the ban wasn't in error there is no chance that it would be removed.
